es.upv.grc.grcbox.server.networkInterfaces

Class NetworkInterfaceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upv.grc.grcbox.server.networkInterfaces.NetworkInterfaceManager

  • public class NetworkInterfaceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage the interaction between the GRCBox and the NetworkManager The communication is done using the DBus interface.

      • readDevicesInfo

        private void readDevicesInfo()
                      throws org.freedesktop.dbus.exceptions.DBusException
        Read the information from the NetworkManager and stores it in devices, also populate the cachedInterfaces map;.
        Throws:
        org.freedesktop.dbus.exceptions.DBusException - the d bus exception

      • device2grcBoxIface

        private es.upv.grc.grcbox.common.GrcBoxInterface device2grcBoxIface(Device dev)
                                                             throws org.freedesktop.dbus.exceptions.DBusException,
                                                                    java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Convert a Device object into a GrcBoxInterface object.
        Parameters:
        dev - the Device object
        Returns:
        the grc box interface
        Throws:
        org.freedesktop.dbus.exceptions.DBusException - Needs to connect to DBus to get all the information, an exception is thrown when there is a problem in the connection.
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - the execution exception
